But the compression/shrink...? I guess it's pretty hard since the main movie is only 2GB...

Audio tracks (ENG/SWE/DAN/NOR/FIN) are 1.5 GB, and the rest are menus/extras.

If the movie is shrinked to 2GB, I don't want this version. The movie should always be as close to 100% as possible, removing (if needed) menus, extras, languages/subtitles etc. It's better to make two version (one nordic and one english).

Picture quality is fine, the movie has never looked better. (Hint: Runtime is 84 min) Thank you teisen63 for including all the languages and the extras!

Kjære Bolius*
Det enkleste for deg er å brenne en DVD-skive v.h.a. f.eks. Nero. DVD'en putter du ganske enkelt inn i din DVD-spiller. Men du kan også se filmen på PC'en. Dobbeltklikk på den første fila i folder VIDEO_TS. Da burde du få opp noe på skjermen din!

This is the most international version of Flåklypa Grand Prix (Norwegian) Pinchcliffe Grand Prix (English) Bjergkøbing Grand Prix (Danish) and something in Swedish and Finnish that I don't know ... Despite all the audio tracks the video is fine - 84 minutes of stop motion puppet movie + 24 minutes of extras, also mostly stop motion.

http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Fl%C3%A5klypa_Grand_Prix

Share the pieces you have and stay for a couple of weeks seeding afterwards or however long it takes to get a 1:1 ratio or better -  and come back once in a while over the next years and keep this little masterpiece alive.
